text:
"Home Alone 3" was the third movie in the "Home Alone" movie series. It is an American criminal comedy movie. Macaulay Culkin, who was in the last two movies, as Kevin McCallister, was too old for this movie. The movie instead features a different household and villains. The director was Raja Gosnell, who was the editor of both original movies and the star actor was Alex D. Linz as Alex D. Pruitt. It was released on December 12, 1997 by 20th Century Fox. The movie grossed $79,082,515 worldwide.
In this movie, Alex is sick at home with the chickenpox. He recovers and must defend his home from four burglars.
A made-for-television sequel, ', followed in 2002 and ' followed in 2012.
